name: Koppers Holdings Inc.
description: Koppers Holdings Inc. is a global leader in providing carbon compounds and treated wood products, primarily serving the railroad, utility, and construction markets. Founded in 1988 and headquartered in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, Koppers specializes in manufacturing and supplying products that enhance infrastructure and industrial applications. With a commitment to sustainability, Koppers offers environmentally friendly solutions, such as its wood preservation products that comply with stringent safety and environmental standards. The company's operations are segmented into three main areas: Railroad and Utility Products, Carbon Materials and Chemicals, and Performance Chemicals. Koppers' Railroad and Utility Products division includes treated ties and utility poles, integral to the transportation and energy sectors. The Carbon Materials and Chemicals division focuses on producing carbon pitch and other chemical byproducts that cater to the growing demand in various industries, including aluminum and steel manufacturing. Performance Chemicals offers wood treatment solutions that extend the life of wooden structures. Through strategic acquisitions and innovative product development, Koppers continues to expand its market reach and enhance its operational efficiencies, while also prioritizing safety and sustainability. The company is dedicated to maintaining high standards of quality and safety in all its products and operations, contributing to the resilience of critical infrastructure around the world.
